name: SSB Interview Preparation
description: SSB Interview Preparation ( Practice ) App includes WAT , TAT , SRT , GTO , Interview , Conference etc. meant to prepare a candidate for SSB. SSB interview Preparation is a platform dedicated to the SSB aspirants where one can prepare and practice for SSB Interview completely.  This app is meant for Interview of all three forces i.e. Army , Air Force, Navy of which the respective boards are SSB , AFSB , NSB.   SSB Interview Practice App serves the following purposes:  * SSB Preparation app walks the candidate through the whole five day long SSB process  and provides ample number of tests for practice.  * Provides explaination and Tips about every aspect of SSB like PIQ form filling, Travelling  Allowance, WAT / SRT / TAT / PPDT Samples, OIR  It provides timed tests for candidates to practice the following:  1. WAT ( Word Association Test ) 2. TAT ( Thematic Apperception Test ) 3. SRT ( Situation Reaction Test ) 4. OIR tests ( Officer intelligence rating) 5. GTO tasks ( Group testing officer ) 6. Personal Interview 7. Conference  * It Also Provides all types of questions that can be asked in the personal Interview that  include :  1. Self Related Questions 2. Friends Related Questions 3. Family Related Questions 4. Hobbies Related Questions 5. Education/Job Related Questions 6. Rapid Fire Questions 7. Defense Related Questions 8. Games/Sports Related Questions 9. Tricky Questions   * GTO also being one of the important part of SSB is included here.  1. Group Discussion including hot topics. 2. Group Planning Exercise including an Example 3. Lecturette with hot topics 4. Progressive Group Task with Tips 5. Snake/ Group Obstacle Race with Tips 6. Individual Obstacles with Tips 7. Command Task with Tips 8. Half Group Task with Tips  9. Final Group Task with Tips  * All tasks of GTO of SSB , AFSB , NSB have been explained here (pictorially as well) which gives the candidate an idea about the GTO beforehand.  * TIPS / WORD OF ADVICE have been provided in all sections for candidates to enhance  their performance.  * ALL THE BEST !
